definitions.definition: An expression of remorse or regret for having said or done something that harmed another: an instance of apologizing (saying that one is sorry ).
examples: What he said really hurt my feelings, but his apology sounded so sincere that I couldn't help but forgive him.
The CEO made a public apology for the scandal, and promised full cooperation with the authorities.

definitions.definition: Anything provided as a substitute ; a makeshift .
examples: a poor apology for a hotel room

main_definition: An expression of remorse or regret for having said or done something that harmed another: an instance of apologizing (saying that one is sorry ).
secondary_definitions: Anything provided as a substitute ; a makeshift .
